ext.description: Create a toc for markdown in each file of the folder to navigate through the project.
config.title: global-project-toc
global-project-toc.files.supportedFileTy: Defines the type of the files that are searched for the %global-project-toc.files.fileHierarchyPositionKeyWord% keyword
global-project-toc.files.createStructure: If true the extension searches all files for the %global-project-toc.files.fileHierarchyPositionKeyWord% keyword to create the toc and the footer. If false the %global-project-toc.files.createStructureFileName% File will be used to get the structure
global-project-toc.files.createstructure: File name of the file that contains the project structure
global-project-toc.outputFile.name: project-structure.yml
